data.author: Hugo Lowell
data.title: Two Trump lawyers could be witnesses or targets in FBI investigation
data.description: Christina Bobb and Evan Corcoran face scrutiny over their communications with the justice department, legal experts sayTwo lawyers for Donald Trump could become witnesses or targets in the obstruction investigation connected to the criminal probe of the former president’s unauthorized retention of highly-sensitive government documents at his Mar-a-Lago resort in Florida, according to legal experts.The lawyers – Christina Bobb and Evan Corcoran – face becoming ensnared in the investigation because they liaised with the justice department during the government’s months-long effort to...
